flavor_text_entries.gold:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.
flavor_text_entries.silver:
It sleeps deep on
the ocean floor to
build its energy. It is said to
cause tornadoes as
it wakes.
flavor_text_entries.crystal:
It stores energy
by sleeping at
underwater depths at which no other
life forms can
survive.
flavor_text_entries.ruby:
KINGDRA lives at extreme ocean depths
that are otherwise uninhabited.
It has long been believed that the yawning of this POKéMON creates
spiraling ocean currents.
flavor_text_entries.sapphire:
KINGDRA sleeps on the seafloor where
it is otherwise devoid of life.
When a storm arrives, the POKéMON is said to awaken and wander about in
search of prey.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
It sleeps quietly, deep on the seafloor.
When it comes up to the surface, it
creates a huge whirlpool that can swallow
even ships.
flavor_text_entries.firered:
It sleeps deep on the ocean floor to
build its energy. It is said to cause
tornadoes as it wakes.
flavor_text_entries.leafgreen:
It is said that it usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by yawning.
flavor_text_entries.diamond:
It lives in caves on the seafloor
and creates giant whirlpools
every time it moves.

It lives in caves on the seafloor
and creates giant whirlpools
every time it moves.

flavor_text_entries.x:
It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves.
It can create whirlpools by yawning.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It stores energy by sleeping at underwater depths
at which no other life-forms can survive.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
Kingdra lives at extreme ocean depths that are otherwise
uninhabited. It has long been believed that the yawning of this
Pokémon creates spiraling ocean currents.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
Kingdra sleeps on the seafloor where it is otherwise devoid
of life. When a storm arrives, the Pokémon is said to awaken
and wander about in search of prey.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
With the arrival of a storm at sea, this Pokémon
will show itself on the surface. When a Kingdra
and a Dragonite meet, a fierce battle ensues.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Scales shed by this Pokémon have such a
splendorous gleam to them that they’ve been
given to royalty as gifts.
